attributes.action: Proper and just assistance for Self Employed during the Covid19 pandemic.
attributes.additional_details: Change the very basic help Self Employed workers have been offered by the Chancellor during the Covid 19 pandemic to a fairer package similar to that of the employed work force of the United Kingdom.
attributes.background: Change the very basic help Self Employed workers have been offered by the Chancellor during the Covid 19 pandemic to a fairer package similar to that of the employed work force of the United Kingdom.

rejection.details:
Since you started your petition the Government has announced support for self-employed individuals: https://www.gov.uk/government/news/chancellor-gives-support-to-millions-of-self-employed-individuals

You can find out more about coronavirus and how you can protect yourself and others here:

NHS website: https://www.nhs.uk/conditions/coronavirus-covid-19/

UK Government website: https://www.gov.uk/coronavirus
